goal.tools

Class AbstractRun<D extends Debugger,C extends GOALInterpreter<D>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.AbstractRun<D,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - class of the Debugger used by the GOALInterpreter
    C - class of the GOALInterpreter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingleRun, UnitTestRun

    public abstract class AbstractRun<D extends Debugger,C extends GOALInterpreter<D>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract run can be used to run a MASProgram. The run will setup the environment, launch the agents. When all agents have terminated the environment will be terminated as well. It is also possible to terminate the mas after a certain duration. The result of the run can be inspected by setting a ResultInspector. The exact agents used depend on the subclass. Subclasses can provide an AgentFactory by implementing the buildAgentFactory(MessagingService) method.
    Author:
    mpkorstanje

    • Field Detail

      • TIMEOUT_FIRST_AGENT_SECONDS

        public static final long TIMEOUT_FIRST_AGENT_SECONDS
        Time to wait for the first agent to be created. Depending on the environment used agents may not appear directly after initializing the environment. This is the maximum duration the system will wait.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • debuggerOutput

        protected boolean debuggerOutput
        True if the agent should log their debugger output. Subclasses should use this to create agents that provide it.

      • run

        public void run()
         throws nl.tudelft.goal.messaging.exceptions.MessagingException,
                GOALCommandCancelledException,
                GOALParseException,
                GOALLaunchFailureException,
                java.lang.InterruptedException,
                eis.exceptions.EnvironmentInterfaceException
        Starts a single run of the mas program.
        Parameters:
        timeout - duration to wait before terminating the program. When zero this will wait until all agents have finished.
        timeUnit - of the duration to wait
